00072 sub prepare_activity_entry {
00073     my $self=shift;
00074     my $r = $self->r;
00075     my $user = $self->r->param('user') || 'NO_USER';
00076     return("In SetMaker2 as user $user");
00077 }
00078 
00079 sub make_myset_data_row {
00080     my $self = shift;
00081     my $sourceFileName = shift;
00082     my $pg = shift;
00083     my $cnt = shift;
00084 
00085     $sourceFileName =~ s|^./||; # clean up top ugliness
00086 
00087     my $urlpath = $self->r->urlpath;
00088     my $db = $self->r->db;
00089 
00090     ## to set up edit and try links elegantly we want to know if
00091     ##    any target set is a gateway assignment or not
00092     my $localSet = $self->r->param('local_sets');
00093     my $setRecord;
00094     if ( defined($localSet) && $localSet ne SELECT_SET_STRING &&
00095          $localSet ne NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING ) {
00096         $setRecord = $db->getGlobalSet( $localSet );
00097     }
00098     my $isGatewaySet = ( defined($setRecord) && 
00099                  $setRecord->assignment_type =~ /gateway/ );
00100 
00101     my $problem_output = $pg->{flags}->{error_flag} ?
00102         CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::em("This problem produced an error"))
00103         : CGI::div({class=>"RenderSolo"}, $pg->{body_text});
00104     $problem_output .= $pg->{flags}->{comment} if($pg->{flags}->{comment});
00105 
00106 
00107     #if($self->{r}->param('browse_which') ne 'browse_npl_library') {
00108     my $problem_seed = $self->{'problem_seed'} || 1234;
00109     my $edit_link = CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink(
00110          $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::PGProblemEditor",
00111               courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID"),
00112               setID=>"Undefined_Set",
00113               problemID=>"1"),
00114             params=>{sourceFilePath => "$sourceFileName", problemSeed=> $problem_seed}
00115           ), target=>"WW_Editor"}, "Edit it" );
00116     
00117     my %delete_box_data = ( -id=>"deleted$cnt".'myset' ,-name=>"deleted$cnt",-value=>1,-label=>"Delete this problem from the target set on the next update");
00118     
00119     my $displayMode = $self->r->param("mydisplayMode");
00120     $displayMode = $self->r->ce->{pg}->{options}->{displayMode}
00121         if not defined $displayMode or $displayMode eq "None";
00122     my $module = ( $isGatewaySet ) ? "GatewayQuiz" : "Problem";
00123     my %pathArgs = ( courseID =>$urlpath->arg("courseID"),
00124             setID=>"Undefined_Set" );
00125     $pathArgs{problemID} = "1" if ( ! $isGatewaySet );
00126 
00127     my $try_link = CGI::a({href=>$self->systemLink(
00128         $urlpath->newFromModule("WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::$module",
00129             %pathArgs ),
00130             params =>{
00131                 effectiveUser => scalar($self->r->param('user')),
00132                 editMode => "SetMaker",
00133                 problemSeed=> $problem_seed,
00134                 sourceFilePath => "$sourceFileName",
00135                 displayMode => $displayMode,
00136             }
00137         ), target=>"WW_View"}, "Try it");
00138 
00139     print CGI::div({-class=>"problem myProblem", -draggable=>"true", -href=>"#", -id=>("$cnt".'myset')},
00140         CGI::p({},"File name: $sourceFileName "), 
00141     CGI::p({}, $edit_link, " ", $try_link),
00142         CGI::p(CGI::checkbox((%delete_box_data),-override=>1)),
00143         CGI::hidden(-id=>"filetrial$cnt".'myset', -name=>"mysetfiletrial$cnt", -default=>$sourceFileName,-override=>1),
00144         CGI::p($problem_output),
00145     );
00146 }

00148 sub clear_default {
00149     my $r = shift;
00150     my $param = shift;
00151     my $default = shift;
00152     my $newvalue = $r->param($param) || '';
00153     $newvalue = '' if($newvalue eq $default);
00154     $r->param($param, $newvalue);
00155 }
00156 
00157 sub pre_header_initialize {
00158     my ($self) = @_;
00159     my $r = $self->r;
00160     ## For all cases, lets set some things
00161     $self->{error}=0;
00162     my $ce = $r->ce;
00163     my $db = $r->db;
00164     
00165     $self->{current_myset_set} = $r->param('myset_sets');
00166     if (not defined($self->{current_myset_set}) 
00167         or $self->{current_myset_set} eq "Select a Homework Set"
00168         or $self->{current_myset_set} eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
00169       my @all_db_sets = $db->listGlobalSets;
00170         @all_db_sets = sortByName(undef, @all_db_sets);
00171         $self->{current_myset_set} = shift(@all_db_sets);
00172       }
00173     
00174     my $userName = $r->param('user');
00175     my $user = $db->getUser($userName); # checked 
00176     die "record for user $userName (real user) does not exist." 
00177         unless defined $user;
00178     my $authz = $r->authz;
00179     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($userName, "modify_problem_sets")) {
00180         return(""); # Error message already produced in the body
00181     }
00182 
00183     my @myset_files=();
00184 
00185   #I'm worried this will break something
00186   my $default_set = $self->{current_myset_set};
00187       #debug("set_to_display is $default_set");
00188       if (not defined($default_set) 
00189         or $default_set eq "Select a Homework Set"
00190         or $default_set eq NO_LOCAL_SET_STRING) {
00191         $self->addbadmessage("You need to select a set from this course to view.");
00192     } else {
00193         # DBFIXME don't use ID list, use an iterator
00194         my @problemList = $db->listGlobalProblems($default_set);
00195         my $problem;
00196         @myset_files=();
00197         for $problem (@problemList) {
00198             my $problemRecord = $db->getGlobalProblem($default_set, $problem); # checked
00199             die "global $problem for set $default_set not found." unless
00200                 $problemRecord;
00201             push @myset_files, $problemRecord->source_file;
00202   
00203         }
00204       #@myset_files = sortByName(undef,@myset_files);
00205     }
00206     ############# Now store data in self for retreival by body
00207 
00208     $self->{myset_files} = \@myset_files;
00209 }

00212 sub title {
00213     return "Library Browser v2";
00214 }

00216 # hide view options panel since it distracts from SetMaker's built-in view options
00217 sub options {
00218     return "";
00219 }

00221 sub head {
00222 
00223   return "";
00224 }
00225 
00226 sub body {
00227     my ($self) = @_;
00228 
00229     my $r = $self->r;
00230     my $ce = $r->ce;        # course environment
00231     my $db = $r->db;        # database
00232     my $j;          # garden variety counter
00233 
00234     my $userName = $r->param('user');
00235 
00236     my $user = $db->getUser($userName); # checked
00237     die "record for user $userName (real user) does not exist."
00238         unless defined $user;
00239 
00240     ### Check that this is a professor
00241     my $authz = $r->authz;
00242     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($userName, "modify_problem_sets")) {
00243         print "User $userName returned " . 
00244             $authz->hasPermissions($user, "modify_problem_sets") . 
00245     " for permission";
00246         return(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'},
00247         CGI::em("You are not authorized to access the Instructor tools.")));
00248     }
00249 
00250     my $showHints = $r->param('showHints');
00251     my $showSolutions = $r->param('showSolutions');
00252     
00253     ##########  Extract information computed in pre_header_initialize
00254 
00255 
00256     my @myset_files =@{$self->{myset_files}};
00257 
00258   my $displayModePlaceholder;
00259     if (not defined($r->param('mydisplayMode'))){
00260       $displayModePlaceholder = "images";
00261     }
00262     else{
00263       $displayModePlaceholder = $r->param('mydisplayMode');
00264     }
00265 
00266     my @myset_html;
00267 
00268   @myset_html = renderProblems(
00269       r=> $r,
00270       user => $user,
00271         problem_list => [@myset_files],
00272         displayMode => $displayModePlaceholder,
00273         showHints => $showHints,
00274         showSolutions => $showSolutions,
00275   );
00276   
00277   my $jj;
00278     print '<div id="mysets_problems" class="problemList">';
00279       for ($jj=0; $jj<scalar(@myset_html); $jj++) { 
00280         $myset_files[$jj] =~ s|^$ce->{courseDirs}->{templates}/?||;
00281         $self->make_myset_data_row($myset_files[$jj], $myset_html[$jj], $jj+1); 
00282       }
00283     print '</div>';
00284     
00285 
00286     return "";  
00287 }
